name: Speak
headline: A superhuman, AI-powered language tutor in your pocket

founders.name: Connor Zwick, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Sold previous company Flashcards+ to Chegg (NYSE: CHGG)

# ‍The languagelearning app thatgets you talking‍
Talk out loud, get instant feedback, and become fluent with the world‚Äôs most advanced AI language tutor.
[Get started for free](http://speak.com/<https:/app.speak.com/us-en/try?showOnboarding>)
![](https://www.speak.com/cdn.prod.website-files.com/61a88c135006e8345b005efd/657a7e08b77b7178d0f7111f_Rectangle%20160765.webp)![](https://www.speak.com/cdn.prod.website-files.com/61a88c135006e8345b005efd/657a79ce7f3dfd2268c9e595_new-phone-mockup.webp)
![](https://www.speak.com/cdn.prod.website-files.com/61a88c135006e8345b005efd/657a79fcf1b0fa6087a250e4_new-phone-scrim.webp)
## You need to speak a language out loud to learn it.
Speak‚Äôs core philosophy is centered around getting you speaking out loud, as much as possible.
## Introducing Speak Tutor. The world‚Äôs best language teacher.
Speak Tutor is your very own language tutor, dedicated to helping you improve 24/7. It may surprise you with all of its unique abilities.
### Build a relationship with your tutor
Speak Tutor designs a personalized curriculum as unique as you are by getting to know you on a surprisingly deep level.
### Talk about anything, anytime, anywhere
Speak Tutor is your on-the-go conversational partner. Practice speaking on any topic, anytime, no matter how niche.
### Stay motivated and reach your goals
Speak Tutor keeps you motivated and accountable to achieve your goals. Learning a language is better with someone by your side.
![](https://www.speak.com/cdn.prod.website-files.com/61a88c135006e8345b005efd/657a95e81607f9df035c474d_fwfsdsdf.webp)
Jessica Park
> ‚ÄúThe first time I used Speak Tutor, I couldn‚Äôt believe it wasn‚Äôt a real person. It feels like it understands my motivations at a deep level and every lesson is made just for me.‚Äù
## Become fluent with the world‚Äôs most advanced speaking curriculum
Speak‚Äôs language education program gets you speaking fluently as quickly as possible. It‚Äôs one of the main reasons people love Speak. We are reimagining what language education looks like. Hear directly from our instructors.

## Frequently Asked Questions
[How do I get started?![](https://www.speak.com/cdn.prod.website-files.com/6527020fd9178787954496dc/6566ec5d518b379a3a98e846_cross.svg)](http://speak.com/<#>)
Download our app from the [Android Playstore](http://speak.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.selabs.speak&pli=1>) or [Apple App store](http://speak.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/speak-language-learning/id1286609883>), or [sign up on web](http://speak.com/<https:/app.speak.com>).
[Is Speak completely free?![](https://www.speak.com/cdn.prod.website-files.com/6527020fd9178787954496dc/6566ec5d518b379a3a98e846_cross.svg)](http://speak.com/<#>)
Speak offers users a 7 day free trial where they can experience all features of the app!
[I can‚Äôt log in to my account, what should I do?![](https://www.speak.com/cdn.prod.website-files.com/6527020fd9178787954496dc/6566ec5d518b379a3a98e846_cross.svg)](http://speak.com/<#>)
1. Try resetting your password [here](http://speak.com/<https:/app.speak.com/us-en/forgot-password>)2. If still having trouble, feel free to reach out to our support team: support@usespeak.com
[When will Speak teach my requested language or support my native language?![](https://www.speak.com/cdn.prod.website-files.com/6527020fd9178787954496dc/6566ec5d518b379a3a98e846_cross.svg)](http://speak.com/<#>)
Join our [waitlist](http://speak.com/<https:/docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeqbkoPYtWLVqnh-qAsG6Wrvy90AQH1qorylIohk6gczlMiVQ/viewform>)! Your opinions and requests help guide our language roadmap.
[I have other questions!![](https://www.speak.com/cdn.prod.website-files.com/6527020fd9178787954496dc/6566ec5d518b379a3a98e846_cross.svg)](http://speak.com/<#>)
We love questions! Please reach out to our customer support team support@usespeak.com or use our [extended FAQ.](http://speak.com/<https:/help.speak.com/en>)
## Start learning a new language today.

## You need to speak a language out loud to learn it.
Speak‚Äôs core philosophy is centered around getting you speaking out loud, as much as possible.
## Introducing Speak Tutor. The world‚Äôs best language teacher.
Speak Tutor is your very own language tutor, dedicated to helping you improve 24/7. It may surprise you with all of its unique abilities.
### Build a relationship with your tutor
Speak Tutor designs a personalized curriculum as unique as you are by getting to know you on a surprisingly deep level.
### Talk about anything, anytime, anywhere
Speak Tutor is your on-the-go conversational partner. Practice speaking on any topic, anytime, no matter how niche.
### Stay motivated and reach your goals
Speak Tutor keeps you motivated and accountable to achieve your goals. Learning a language is better with someone by your side.
![](https://www.speak.com/cdn.prod.website-files.com/61a88c135006e8345b005efd/657a95e81607f9df035c474d_fwfsdsdf.webp)

## Become fluent with the world‚Äôs most advanced speaking curriculum
Speak‚Äôs language education program gets you speaking fluently as quickly as possible. It‚Äôs one of the main reasons people love Speak. We are reimagining what language education looks like. Hear directly from our instructors.

generated_description:
### Speak: Your AI-Powered Language Tutor

**Website:** [speak.com](http://speak.com)

**Mission:** Speak aims to be a superhuman, AI-powered language tutor that's always at your fingertips.

#### Company Overview
Speak is positioned centrally in the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco, where a skilled team of 40 is making waves in the educational technology space. It emerged from the Y Combinator Batch W17, and is focused on transforming how people learn languages through a conversational and interactive approach.

#### What Makes Speak Unique?
The cornerstone of Speak's methodology is the recognition that speaking out loud is vital for language acquisition. Their AI, known as Speak Tutor, is designed to feel as real as chatting with a person while providing instant feedback and personalized lessons. This makes learning both engaging and effective, catering to the user's individual style and pace.

#### Key Features
- **Personalization:** Speak Tutor creates a unique curriculum based on your preferences, helping to build a relationship that enhances learning.
- **On-Demand Practice:** You can talk about anything, anytime, allowing for real-world application without the pressure of classroom settings.
- **Accountability:** The AI helps keep learners motivated and on track toward their goals, which can be particularly beneficial for those who struggle with traditional learning methods.

#### Popularity & Reviews
With over 10 million downloads and an impressive 4.8-star rating, users praise Speak as a revolutionary tool for language learning. Customers report significant improvements in their fluency and confidence in conversation‚Äîa testament to Speak‚Äôs effectiveness.

Here are a few user testimonials:
- *‚ÄúIt feels like it understands my motivations at a deep level and every lesson is made just for me.‚Äù* ‚Äî Jessica Park
- *‚ÄúAs a shy person, I speak more English than before I used this app.‚Äù* ‚Äî Blair Lee

#### Getting Started
Speak offers new users a seven-day free trial, allowing them to explore the app's features and experience its AI-powered tutoring style. You can easily access the app on both iOS and Android platforms, or simply sign up via the web.

If you're curious about how to start your language learning journey, or if you have other questions, the user-friendly FAQs on their site provide helpful guidance.

### Conclusion
In a world where communication is increasingly global, Speak offers an innovative, AI-driven approach that breaks down barriers to language learning. Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or looking to polish your skills, Speak positions itself as a friendly companion on the path to fluency‚Äîbecoming not just an app but an indispensable part of your learning journey.
